headline: Joe Biden Leaves Nothing but Questions After Ditching His Presidential Duties Again
author: Bonchie
sentences: Other than that, though, he has a habit of making himself scarce while his handlers gaslight about how hard of a worker he is.Biden has provided another example of that with an inexplicable decision to send Kamala Harris to the Munich Security Conference, where the President of the United States normally speaks.
Sometimes, Joe Biden will show up to give a pre-written statement to the media, and once every three months or so, heâ€™ll actually answer questions from hand-selected reporters.
The answer to that question largely depends on what day it is.
Does the United State actually have a president?
